DOC.brief_summary: This survey conduct prepare application material re-examination Pharmaceutical Affairs Laws Enforcement Regulation , aim reconfirm clinical usefulness FOSAMAX PLUS / FOSAMAX PLUS D collect safety information accord Re-examination Regulation New Drugs .
